remarks: Distributive law for Hilbert space operator difference.  (Interestingly, the reverse distributive law ~ hocsubdiri does not require linearity.) (Contributed by NM, 11-Mar-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hoddi.1 $e |- R e. LinOp $.
hoddi.2 $e |- S : ~H --> ~H $.
hoddi.3 $e |- T : ~H --> ~H $.
hoddii $p |- ( R o. ( S -op T ) ) = ( ( R o. S ) -op ( R o. T ) ) $.
